page.title: 05Lancaster University
page.content: 2500 students live in the University of Lancaster. 2000 are undergraduates 500 are postgraduates. The students' rooms are very small most of them can only hold a wardrobe, bed & desk. The 1st years have first choice of a room in one of the 8 colleges & most 3rd years can live in if they wish. They have to share kitchens and bathrooms with up to 20 other students. Students who do not live in the university usually stay in holiday accomodation in Lancaster or Morecambe. Married students with families tend to live in the country areas. At the university there is a creche for the students' babies and small children. Some post graduate courses run for 12 months from one September to another without holidays. Many foreign families stay the full 3 years as it is too far to go home
